contentrichtext.text: {{for|user warning templates|Wikipedia:UTM}} '''UW''', '''''U<sub>w</sub>''''', or '''uw''' may refer to: ==Universities== ===Canada=== * [[University of Waterloo]] * [[University of Windsor]] * [[University of Winnipeg]] ===Germany=== * [[University of Wuppertal]] * [[University of Würzburg]] ===Poland=== * [[University of Warsaw]] * [[University of Wrocław]] ===United States of America=== * [[University of Washington]] * [[University of Wisconsin System]] * [[University of Wisconsin–La Crosse]] * [[University of Wisconsin–Madison]] * [[University of Wisconsin–Milwaukee]] * [[University of Wyoming]] ==Other uses== * [[Unconventional warfare]] * ''[[Unia Wolnosci]]'' (Freedom Union), a Polish political party * [[uw (digraph)]] * ''U<sub>w</sub>'', the international symbol for [[relative humidity]] ==See also== * [[WU (disambiguation)]] * [[U of W (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation|school}}
